thread.title: BRIEF-Sequans Communications Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of ADSs

title: BRIEF-Sequans Communications Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of ADSs

organizations.name: public offering of adss reuters staff

text:
January 17, 2018 / 2:47 PM / Updated 28 minutes ago BRIEF-Sequans Communications Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of ADSs Reuters Staff 
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Sequans Communications SA: 
* SEQUANS COMMUNICATIONS S.A. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES 
* SAYS ‍PRICING OF OFFERING OF ADSS REPRESENTING 12.5 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES, AT PRICE OF $1.60/ADS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
